System.M_CTL001: SELECT COALESCE(M.USERID, '') AS USERID , COALESCE(M.C_KEY, '') AS C_KEY , COALESCE(M.C_NAME, '') AS C_NAME , COALESCE(M.C_DATA, '') AS C_DATA , COALESCE(M.C_HELP, '') AS C_HELP , COALESCE(M.C_BM, '') AS C_BM , COALESCE(M.C_DECBM, '') AS C_DECBM , COALESCE(M.C_ATTR, '') AS C_ATTR , COALESCE(M.MTN_FLG, '') AS MTN_FLG , COALESCE(M.CNT_FLG, '') AS CNT_FLG , COALESCE(M.UPD_FLG, '') AS UPD_FLG , COALESCE(M.ADD_USER, '') AS ADD_USER , COALESCE(M.ADD_PC, '') AS ADD_PC , COALESCE(M.ADD_DATE, 0) AS ADD_DATE , COALESCE(M.ADD_TIME, 0) AS ADD_TIME , COALESCE(M.LASTUP_USER, '') AS LASTUP_USER , COALESCE(M.LASTUP_PC, '') AS LASTUP_PC , COALESCE(M.LASTUP_DATE, 0) AS LASTUP_DATE , COALESCE(M.LASTUP_TIME, 0) AS LASTUP_TIME , COALESCE(E_ADD_USER.EMP_NAME,'') AS ADD_USER_VIEW , COALESCE(E_LASTUP_USER.EMP_NAME,'') AS LASTUP_USER_VIEW FROM M_CTL M LEFT JOIN M_EMP E_ADD_USER ON M.ADD_USER = E_ADD_USER.EMP_USER LEFT JOIN M_EMP E_LASTUP_USER ON M.LASTUP_USER = E_LASTUP_USER .EMP_USER
System.M_CTL002: SELECT COALESCE(M.USERID, '') AS USERID , COALESCE(M.C_KEY, '') AS C_KEY , COALESCE(M.C_NAME, '') AS C_NAME , COALESCE(M.C_DATA, '') AS C_DATA , COALESCE(M.C_HELP, '') AS C_HELP , COALESCE(M.C_BM, '') AS C_BM , COALESCE(M.C_DECBM, '') AS C_DECBM , COALESCE(M.C_ATTR, '') AS C_ATTR , COALESCE(M.MTN_FLG, '') AS MTN_FLG , COALESCE(M.CNT_FLG, '') AS CNT_FLG , COALESCE(M.UPD_FLG, '') AS UPD_FLG , COALESCE(M.ADD_USER, '') AS ADD_USER , COALESCE(M.ADD_PC, '') AS ADD_PC , COALESCE(M.ADD_DATE, 0) AS ADD_DATE , COALESCE(M.ADD_TIME, 0) AS ADD_TIME , COALESCE(M.LASTUP_USER, '') AS LASTUP_USER , COALESCE(M.LASTUP_PC, '') AS LASTUP_PC , COALESCE(M.LASTUP_DATE, 0) AS LASTUP_DATE , COALESCE(M.LASTUP_TIME, 0) AS LASTUP_TIME , COALESCE(E_ADD_USER.EMP_NAME,'') AS ADD_USER_VIEW , COALESCE(E_LASTUP_USER.EMP_NAME,'') AS LASTUP_USER_VIEW FROM M_CTL M LEFT JOIN M_EMP E_ADD_USER ON M.ADD_USER = E_ADD_USER.EMP_USER LEFT JOIN M_EMP E_LASTUP_USER ON M.LASTUP_USER = E_LASTUP_USER .EMP_USER WHERE M.USERID = ? AND M.C_KEY = ?
System.M_CTL003: INSERT INTO M_CTL ( USERID , C_KEY , C_NAME , C_DATA , C_HELP , C_BM , C_DECBM , C_ATTR , MTN_FLG , CNT_FLG , UPD_FLG , ADD_USER , ADD_PC , ADD_DATE , ADD_TIME , LASTUP_USER , LASTUP_PC , LASTUP_DATE , LASTUP_TIME ) VALUES ( ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
System.M_CTL004: UPDATE M_CTL SET USERID = ? , C_KEY = ? , C_NAME = ? , C_DATA = ? , C_HELP = ? , C_BM = ? , C_DECBM = ? , C_ATTR = ? , MTN_FLG = ? , CNT_FLG = ? , UPD_FLG = ? , LASTUP_USER = ? , LASTUP_PC = ? , LASTUP_DATE = ? , LASTUP_TIME = ? WHERE USERID = ? AND C_KEY = ?
System.M_CTL005: DELETE FROM M_CTL WHERE USERID = ? AND C_KEY = ?
System.M_CTL007: SELECT MAX(USERID + '-' + C_KEY) AS MAX_CODE FROM M_CTL M
System.M_CTL008: SELECT COALESCE(M.USERID, '') AS USERID , COALESCE(M.C_KEY, '') AS C_KEY , COALESCE(M.C_NAME, '') AS C_NAME , COALESCE(M.C_DATA, '') AS C_DATA , COALESCE(M.C_HELP, '') AS C_HELP , COALESCE(M.C_BM, '') AS C_BM , COALESCE(M.C_DECBM, '') AS C_DECBM , COALESCE(M.C_ATTR, '') AS C_ATTR , COALESCE(M.MTN_FLG, '') AS MTN_FLG , COALESCE(M.CNT_FLG, '') AS CNT_FLG , COALESCE(M.UPD_FLG, '') AS UPD_FLG , COALESCE(M.ADD_USER, '') AS ADD_USER , COALESCE(M.ADD_PC, '') AS ADD_PC , COALESCE(M.ADD_DATE, 0) AS ADD_DATE , COALESCE(M.ADD_TIME, 0) AS ADD_TIME , COALESCE(M.LASTUP_USER, '') AS LASTUP_USER , COALESCE(M.LASTUP_PC, '') AS LASTUP_PC , COALESCE(M.LASTUP_DATE, 0) AS LASTUP_DATE , COALESCE(M.LASTUP_TIME, 0) AS LASTUP_TIME , COALESCE(E_ADD_USER.EMP_NAME,'') AS ADD_USER_VIEW , COALESCE(E_LASTUP_USER.EMP_NAME,'') AS LASTUP_USER_VIEW FROM M_CTL M LEFT JOIN M_EMP E_ADD_USER ON M.ADD_USER = E_ADD_USER.EMP_USER LEFT JOIN M_EMP E_LASTUP_USER ON M.LASTUP_USER = E_LASTUP_USER .EMP_USER
System.M_CTL009: SELECT COALESCE(M.USERID, '') AS USERID , COALESCE(M.C_KEY, '') AS C_KEY , COALESCE(M.C_NAME, '') AS C_NAME , COALESCE(M.C_DATA, '') AS C_DATA , COALESCE(M.C_HELP, '') AS C_HELP , COALESCE(M.C_BM, '') AS C_BM , COALESCE(M.C_DECBM, '') AS C_DECBM , COALESCE(M.C_ATTR, '') AS C_ATTR , COALESCE(M.MTN_FLG, '') AS MTN_FLG , COALESCE(M.CNT_FLG, '') AS CNT_FLG , COALESCE(M.UPD_FLG, '') AS UPD_FLG , COALESCE(M.ADD_USER, '') AS ADD_USER , COALESCE(M.ADD_PC, '') AS ADD_PC , COALESCE(M.ADD_DATE, 0) AS ADD_DATE , COALESCE(M.ADD_TIME, 0) AS ADD_TIME , COALESCE(M.LASTUP_USER, '') AS LASTUP_USER , COALESCE(M.LASTUP_PC, '') AS LASTUP_PC , COALESCE(M.LASTUP_DATE, 0) AS LASTUP_DATE , COALESCE(M.LASTUP_TIME, 0) AS LASTUP_TIME , COALESCE(E_ADD_USER.EMP_NAME,'') AS ADD_USER_VIEW , COALESCE(E_LASTUP_USER.EMP_NAME,'') AS LASTUP_USER_VIEW FROM M_CTL M LEFT JOIN M_EMP E_ADD_USER ON M.ADD_USER = E_ADD_USER.EMP_USER LEFT JOIN M_EMP E_LASTUP_USER ON M.LASTUP_USER = E_LASTUP_USER .EMP_USER
System.M_CTL010: SELECT COALESCE(M.USERID, '') AS USERID , COALESCE(M.C_KEY, '') AS KEY , COALESCE(M.C_NAME, '') AS NAME , COALESCE(M.C_DATA, '') AS DATA , COALESCE(M.C_HELP, '') AS HELP , COALESCE(M.C_BM, '') AS 入力桁数 , COALESCE(M.C_DECBM, '') AS 入力桁数(小数桁) , COALESCE(M.C_ATTR, '') AS 入力属性地 , COALESCE(M.MTN_FLG, '') AS メンテフラグ , COALESCE(M.CNT_FLG, '') AS コントロールフラグ , COALESCE(M.UPD_FLG, '') AS 変更可否フラグ , COALESCE(M.ADD_USER, '') AS 登録ユーザー名 , COALESCE(M.ADD_PC, '') AS 登録ＰＣ名 , COALESCE(M.ADD_DATE, 0) AS 登録日付 , COALESCE(M.ADD_TIME, 0) AS 登録時刻 , COALESCE(M.LASTUP_USER, '') AS 最終更新ユーザー名 , COALESCE(M.LASTUP_PC, '') AS 最終更新ＰＣ名 , COALESCE(M.LASTUP_DATE, 0) AS 最終更新日付 , COALESCE(M.LASTUP_TIME, 0) AS 最終更新時刻 , COALESCE(E_ADD_USER.EMP_NAME,'') AS ADD_USER_VIEW , COALESCE(E_LASTUP_USER.EMP_NAME,'') AS LASTUP_USER_VIEW FROM M_CTL M LEFT JOIN M_EMP E_ADD_USER ON M.ADD_USER = E_ADD_USER.EMP_USER LEFT JOIN M_EMP E_LASTUP_USER ON M.LASTUP_USER = E_LASTUP_USER .EMP_USER
System.M_CTL011: INSERT INTO M_CTL ( USERID , C_KEY , C_NAME , C_DATA , C_HELP , C_BM , C_DECBM , C_ATTR , MTN_FLG , CNT_FLG , UPD_FLG , ADD_USER , ADD_PC , ADD_DATE , ADD_TIME , LASTUP_USER , LASTUP_PC , LASTUP_DATE , LASTUP_TIME ) SELECT ? , C_KEY , C_NAME , C_DATA , C_HELP , C_BM , C_DECBM , C_ATTR , MTN_FLG , CNT_FLG , UPD_FLG , ADD_USER , ADD_PC , ADD_DATE , ADD_TIME , LASTUP_USER , LASTUP_PC , LASTUP_DATE , LASTUP_TIME FROM M_CTL WHERE USERID = ? AND C_KEY NOT IN ( SELECT C_KEY from M_CTL WHERE USERID = ? ) AND MTN_FLG = ? AND CNT_FLG = 1
System.M_CTL012: DELETE FROM M_CTL WHERE USERID = ? AND MTN_FLG = ?
